scripts.build:wasm: mkdir -p public && gmake -BC paka -f emcc.mak EFLAGS='--bind --embed-file ../bins/boot.bc@/boot.bc -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s INVOKE_RUN=0 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="[_main]" -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="[ccall]" -s EXIT_RUNTIME=0 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s WASM=1 -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=1 -s MODULARIZE=1  -DVM_EMCC'
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:js
